author: Julia Alexander
title: Tiger King is a viral success because Netflix rules the jungle
description: Netflix has the first breakout hit in the form of Tiger King, a seven-part documentary about a number of eccentric private zoo owners. It comes at time of a time when people are forced to stay home and self-isolate.
content:
The first viral show during the worlds lockdown period
Courtesy of NETFLIX
Even if people havent seen Tiger King, Eric Goodes seven-part documentary series about private zoo owners with an affinity for large cats (lions, tigers, leopards, jaguars, and couga… [+3834 chars]
